QuestData.Title: A Priest's End
QuestData.Description:
You're a trained priest, right $n? This might be up your alley.
We've spotted the bodies of other recruits from our expedition.
I'm guessing they washed up on a different part of the island. They didn't make it very far.
When you have a moment, could you say a few prayers over them? Just to help put their spirits at ease.
We'll give them a proper burial once we deal with the ogres.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the corpses of the first expedition recruits.
QuestData.RewardText:
There's no time fer chatting. I'm going tae bless ye with the power to resurrect.
I'd give ye a bit more ceremony, but we got an urgent problem on our hands.
If we don't hurry, the souls of these poor recruits will be consumed by the ogre's necromancy!

Objectives.Objective: Look for the corpses of the first expedition recruits
